mn42:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn42:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena veranjaka brahmanagahapatika savatthiyam pativasanti kenacideva karaniyena.
mn42:2.3: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn42:2.4: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn42:2.5: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’.
mn42:2.6: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
mn42:2.7: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam; kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
mn42:2.8: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn42:3.1: Atha kho veranjaka brahmanagahapatika yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva appekacce bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu, sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce bhagavato santike namagottam savetva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce tunhibhuta ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho veranjaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn42:4.1: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti?
mn42:4.2: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti?
mn42:5.1: “Adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn42:5.2: Dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
mn42:6.1: “Na kho mayam imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa, vittharena attham avibhattassa, vittharena attham ajanama.
mn42:6.2: Sadhu no bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu yatha mayam imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa, vittharena attham avibhattassa, vittharena attham ajaneyyama”ti.
mn42:6.3: “Tena hi, gahapatayo, sunatha sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn42:6.4: “Evam, bho”ti kho veranjaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavato paccassosum.
mn42:7.1: “Tividham kho, gahapatayo, kayena adhammacari visamacari hoti, catubbidham vacaya adhammacari visamacari hoti, tividham manasa adhammacari visamacari hoti.
mn42:8.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham kayena adhammacari visamacari hoti?
mn42:8.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco panatipati hoti. Luddo lohitapani hatappahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn42:8.3: Adinnadayi kho pana hoti. Yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam … tam adinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti.
mn42:8.4: Kamesumicchacari kho pana hoti. Ya ta maturakkhita … tatharupasu carittam apajjita hoti.
mn42:8.5: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham kayena adhammacari visamacari hoti.
mn42:9.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya adhammacari visamacari hoti?
mn42:9.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musavadi hoti. Sabhagato va … sampajanamusa bhasita hoti.
mn42:9.3: Pisunavaco kho pana hoti. Ito sutva amutra akkhata … vaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn42:9.4: Pharusavaco kho pana hoti. Ya sa vaca andaka kakkasa … tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn42:9.5: Samphappalapi kho pana hoti. Akalavadi … apariyantavatim anatthasamhitam.
mn42:9.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya adhammacari visamacari hoti.
mn42:10.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham manasa adhammacari visamacari hoti?
mn42:10.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco abhijjhalu hoti …pe… tam mamassa’ti.
mn42:10.3: Byapannacitto kho pana hoti padutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta hannantu va … ma va ahesun’ti.
mn42:10.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham manasa adhammacari visamacari hoti.
mn42:10.7: Evam adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn42:11.1: Tividham kho, gahapatayo, kayena dhammacari samacari hoti, catubbidham vacaya dhammacari samacari hoti, tividham manasa dhammacari samacari hoti.
mn42:12.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham kayena dhammacari samacari hoti?
mn42:12.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti, nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati.
mn42:12.3: Adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti, yam tam parassa … tam nadinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti.
mn42:12.4: Kamesumicchacaram pahaya … tatharupasu na carittam apajjita hoti.
mn42:12.5: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham kayena dhammacari samacari hoti.
mn42:13.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya dhammacari samacari hoti?
mn42:13.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato hoti. Sabhagato va …pe… na sampajanamusa bhasita hoti.
mn42:13.3: Pisunam vacam pahaya … samaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn42:13.4: Pharusam vacam pahaya … tatharupam vacam bhasita hoti.
mn42:13.5: Samphappalapam pahaya … kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam.
mn42:13.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya dhammacari samacari hoti.
mn42:14.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham manasa dhammacari samacari hoti?
mn42:14.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco anabhijjhalu hoti. Yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam tam nabhijjhata hoti: ‘aho vata yam parassa, tam mamassa’ti.
mn42:14.3: Abyapannacitto kho pana hoti appadutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta avera abyabajjha anigha sukhi attanam pariharantu’ti.
mn42:14.5: ‘atthi dinnam, atthi yittham … sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn42:14.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham manasa dhammacari samacari hoti.
mn42:14.7: Evam dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
mn42:15.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana khattiyamahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:15.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana khattiyamahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:16-17.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana brahmanamahasalanam …pe…
mn42:16-17.4: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana gahapatimahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:18-42.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.7: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam …
mn42:18-42.13: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana brahmakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.17: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana abhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn42:18-42.18: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana abhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:18-42.22: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana parittabhanam devanam …pe…
mn42:18-42.38: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana nevasannanasannayatanupaganam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn42:43.2: ‘aho vataham asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti;
mn42:43.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, ‘yam so asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya.
mn42:44.1: Evam vutte, veranjaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn42:44.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn42:44.4: Ete mayam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchama dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn42:44.5: Upasake no bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupete saranam gate”ti.
